sentences.en: ‘You never ask my opinion about anything,’ Rod complained.
sentences.cn: “你什么事都不问问我的看法。”罗德抱怨道。

sentences.en: "I wish someone would do something about it," he complained.
sentences.cn: “我希望有人能对此做点什么，”他抱怨道。

sentences.en: All she ever does is whinge and complain.
sentences.cn: 她只是不停地抱怨。

sentences.en: Critics may complain that the novel's central conceit is rather simplistic.
sentences.cn: 批评家们可能会认为小说的核心比喻过于简单。

sentences.en: Employees complained bitterly about working conditions.
sentences.cn: 雇员们对工作条件十分不满。

sentences.en: Faculty members complain that their students are unprepared to do college-level work.
sentences.cn: 学院的老师们抱怨说他们的学生还很不适应大学的课业。

sentences.en: He came to complain about the volume of the music.
sentences.cn: 他过来抱怨音乐的音量太高了。

sentences.en: Hillsden was complain-ing of cramp in his calf muscles.
sentences.cn: 希尔斯登说他小腿抽筋。

sentences.en: His persistent attempts to complain to his superiors were blocked and ignored.
sentences.cn: 他一再试图向上级投诉，但都被挡了回来并置之不理。

sentences.en: How can you complain about higher taxes?
sentences.cn: 你怎么能抱怨税费的提高呢？

sentences.en: I can't understand why folks complain about false teeth.
sentences.cn: 我就不明白，人们为什么老是抱怨假牙的问题。

sentences.en: I shouldn't complain, I've got a good job to go back to.
sentences.cn: 我不该抱怨，我已有可回去干的一份好工作。

sentences.en: If you are not happy about a repair, go back and complain.
sentences.cn: 如果你对修理效果不满意，可以再找他们投诉。

sentences.en: If you can't get any satisfaction, complain to the park owner.
sentences.cn: 如果你得不到任何赔偿，向园区所有者投诉。

sentences.en: If you're not satisfied with the life you're living, don't just complain. Do something about it.
sentences.cn: 对于现况的不满，不能只是抱怨，要有勇气作出改变。

sentences.en: Miners have complained bitterly that the government did not fulfil their promises.
sentences.cn: 矿工们已愤愤地抱怨政府没有兑现他们的承诺。

sentences.en: People should complain when they consider an advert offensive.
sentences.cn: 民众如果认为某个广告具有冒犯性就应该投诉。

sentences.en: People usually complain about having to deal with too much bureaucracy.
sentences.cn: 人们经常抱怨不得不应付太多的繁文缛节。

sentences.en: Residents are complaining because traffic in the area has increased.
sentences.cn: 由于这个地区的交通流量有所增加，居民都在抱怨。

sentences.en: The couple complained about the high cost of visiting Europe.
sentences.cn: 这对夫妇抱怨了游览欧洲的高昂花费。

sentences.en: The leaflet explains how to complain to the banking ombudsman.
sentences.cn: 这份传单介绍了如何向银行意见调查官投诉。

sentences.en: They may complain of diarrhea or bellyache.
sentences.cn: 他们可能会主诉腹泻或腹痛。

words.tran_cn: 抱怨地；发牢骚地；诉苦地
[法] 原告；发牢骚的人；抱怨者

trans.tran_en: to say that you are annoyed, not satisfied, or unhappy about something or someone
to say that you are annoyed, not satisfied, or unhappy about something or someone
